text:
Hello, has anyone faced this error while loading “bert-uncased_L-12_H-768_A-12” model from Transformers.jl?
Deleting the compiled directory ( ~/.julia/compiled ) didn’t work.
`julia> bert_model, wordpiece, tokenizer = pretrain"bert-uncased_L-24_H-1024_A-16"`
```[ Info: loading pretrain bert model: uncased_L-24_H-1024_A-16.tfbson 
ERROR: EOFError: read end of file```

elements.text:
Hello, has anyone faced this error while loading “bert-uncased_L-12_H-768_A-12” model from Transformers.jl?
Deleting the compiled directory ( ~/.julia/compiled ) didn’t work.

[ Info: loading pretrain bert model: uncased_L-24_H-1024_A-16.tfbson 
ERROR: EOFError: read end of file

text:
I think it's because of incomplete download of the file, similar as here (<https://github.com/FluxML/Metalhead.jl/issues/58>)
You may try deleting the existing .bson file from ~/.julia/datadeps/, and then redownload the file
